name: Travel 30*40cm. Floral
description:
The whole family can now stay cool and refreshed!
Size:30*40cm

Xmas special offer! Use the promo code: CGPXM when checkout to save 15%.

This multi purpose Cool GelPlus pad gives you relief from the hot suffering summer heat.

.Non-toxic
.Safe for all ages
.No baterries or electricity required
.Soft and comfortbale
﻿.Healthy and Environmentally friendly
.Help to reduce muscle aches and pains
​﻿﻿.Get instant relief from heat​

REST! SLEEP! PLAY! SAVE!

SAFE MATERIAL, QUALITY GUARANTEED!

This product has been approved and certified by SGS and MSDS.
